articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Remodeling Site of Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Remodeling Site of Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace
						
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the remodeling site of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace.
					 Going round various places of the site, he encouraged the soldier-builders in their drive to devotedly carry out the order given by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He learned in detail about the progress made in the remodeling project and the supply of building materials, etc. 
					
					 He underlined the need to ensure the best quality in construction, true to the noble intention of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to remodel the palace as the best one for children in the world.
					
					 He took measures to help relevant units satisfactorily supply building materials and to decisively increase the proportion of locally available finishing building materials.
					
					 Earlier, he visited the site for remodeling and repairing the Central Zoo and the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex.
					
					 He stressed the need to improve the quality of structures, true to the party's Juche-based idea of architecture, and overhaul rolling stock under plan.

articles.title: DPRK Says No to U.S. Dialogue on Human Rights, Nuclear Dialogue Aimed to Bring down It
articles.content:
DPRK Says No to U.S. Dialogue on Human Rights, Nuclear Dialogue Aimed to Bring down It 
						
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Tuesday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA blasting the U.S. for politicizing its accusation against the DPRK over its human rights issue:
					 U.S. authorities including the secretary of State and the special envoy for six-party talks of the Department of State let loose a spate of politically motivated malignant invectives to tarnish the image of the DPRK politically and morally and justify its moves to isolate and stifle it over its non-existent "human rights issue".
					
					 It is a trite method of the U.S. to fake up "human rights issues" of those countries which incur its displeasure, cause internal instability, split and destabilization and thus seek regime changes through "coloring revolution" and "peaceful transition" in the long-run. 
					
					 There is a big difference between the discussion on genuine human rights and "human rights issue" used as a political lever for making something like "coloring revolution." 
					
					 The U.S. does not recognize the state sovereignty which comprehensively reflects the human rights of the Korean people. It is, therefore, nonsensical for the U.S. to take issue with their human rights this or that way.
					
					 The present U.S. administration, the present U.S. secretary of State, in particular, unlike the successive U.S. administrations, are officially pursuing a policy for bringing down the state and social system of the DPRK over the "human rights issue", thus reneging on the September 19, 2005 joint statement which calls upon the DPRK and the U.S. to "respect each other's sovereignty and exist peacefully," the statement which laid a basic groundwork for denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula.
					
					  The denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula has become totally meaningless for the DPRK under the situation where the U.S. is reneging on its commitment. It is self-evident that one party cannot discuss its unilateral disarming with the rival party keen to bring it down at any cost.
					
					 The DPRK keeps the door of dialogue on genuine human rights open to the countries that respect its sovereignty but it will never allow any human rights dialogue or nuclear one with the enemy keen to overthrow it.
					
					 The U.S. will witness the shining victory of the DPRK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts before the expiry of the tenure of office of the present administration, not just the distant future.

articles.title: Natural Energy Institute Established in DPRK
articles.content:
Natural Energy Institute Established in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- A natural energy institute has taken its shape at the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK under the deep care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The institute is equipped with various rooms for researches into wind energy, geotherm, solar heat and other natural energies, e-library, laboratories, a pilot plant, etc. It also has catering and welfare service facilities.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un initiated the construction of this institute, settling all the problems arising in it. And he recently visited the institute and examined its scientists' achievements.
					
					 Ri Myong Son, director of the institute, told KCNA that its scientists would intensify the drive for breaking through the cutting edge to live up to Kim Jong Un's loving care and deep trust.

articles.title: Sports Information Service Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Sports Information Service Brisk in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang November 4 (KCNA) -- Sports information service is getting brisk in the DPRK.
					 What has played a key role in this service is the Sports Science Library in Pyongyang.
					
					 The library directs primary efforts to collecting latest data on sports science, urgently needed for the development of the nation's sports technique, in close touch with the State Academy of Sciences and local sports teams and related units. At present, a work is going on to rapidly introduce the collected data to all sports units through local network.
					
					 And it has worked hard to steadily improve its service in keeping with specific conditions of different units across the country.
					
					 Besides, the library is busy with a work to set up a new information service network for the development of mass sports events.

articles.title: Socialism Is Ideal of Mankind, Irresistible Trend of Times: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Socialism Is Ideal of Mankind, Irresistible Trend of Times: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates an article to the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science".
					 The work, published on Nov. 1, Juche 83 (1994), clarifies the idea that Korean-style socialism based on the Juche-based theory of socialism is the most scientific and viable socialism and the principled issues arising in defending socialism.
					
					 The course of the development of history over the past 20 years represents a history in which the might of the truth about the work has been fully displayed, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Associations and groups for the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, associations for the study of Songun politics and groups for the study of the Juche idea have been formed in many countries of the world to give wide publicity to the idea of independence, the genuine socialist idea.
					
					  The number of those people opting for exchange and cooperation with the DPRK with a correct understanding of it is on the daily increase despite the imperialists' false propaganda and economic blockade against it.
					
					 The truth that socialism is a science is clearly proved by the fact that the DPRK serves as a beacon of hope to which the world progressives look up in the difficult period and emerged a fortress of socialism unfazed by any imperialists' moves to stifle it.
					
					 If the difference between socialism and capitalism is made as big in all aspects as that between heaven and earth, an increasing number of people of the world will sympathize with socialism as a science, wage a dynamic struggle to build socialism and its final victory will be hastened so much.
					
					 It will not be a distant future when capitalism goes to a total ruin and socialism will ultimately triumph, the article concludes.

articles.title: Minju Joson on Ulterior Motive of U.S. Extension of Transfer of OPECON
articles.content:
Minju Joson on Ulterior Motive of U.S. Extension of Transfer of OPECON
						
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. agreed with the south Korean puppet authorities to indefinitely extend the transfer of the right to the wartime operation control (OPECON) at the 46th south Korea-U.S. annual security consultative meeting.
					 This made it possible for the U.S. to lord it over in south Korea, exercising the right to OPECON until it deems necessary. 
					
					 As regards the extension of the transfer of OPECON, the U.S. claimed it was an unavoidable step taken in consideration of the south Korean authorities' earnest requests and interests. 
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. is pretending to make a sort of "sacrifice" to "protect" south Korea from the "military threat" of someone, but this is nothing but a clumsy jugglery.
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to carry out its pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy in a bid to maintain its status as the "world's only superpower" and realize its scenario to dominate the world at any cost.
					
					 South Korea is used as the most important main base and military springboard to realize the U.S. pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy.
					
					 That is why the U.S. is not willing to allow any slightest development which may lead to the pullback of its forces from south Korea.
					
					 The recent agreement reflects this brigandish demand of Washington.
					
					 Its intention to hold OPECON for an indefinite period is, in essence, aimed to stick to its policy for military confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 This goes to clearly prove what inveterate repugnancy and hostility the U.S. has towards the DPRK.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges S. Korean Authorities to Be Aware of Gravity of Situation
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges S. Korean Authorities to Be Aware of Gravity of Situation 
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Wicked human scum conducted another anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operation in the area of Pochon, Kyonggi Province at mid-night on October 31.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The human scum's scattering of leaflets hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is becoming evermore undisguised because of the south Korean authorities' connivance, patronage and encouragement.  Their absurd claim that "there is no legal ground to halt the leaflet scattering operation" is nothing but a pretext to cover up their confrontational purpose.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have keen interests in achieving "unification through absorption" only and have no idea of mending the relations with the north as they are zealously pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward it and Washington's scenario for dominating the world. 
					
					 They are using human scum as a shock brigade for concealing such ulterior purpose and misleading the public opinion at home and abroad. They are orchestrating the reckless leaflet-scattering operation by paying a fabulous amount of money to those betes noires. 
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that people of various circles in south Korea censure the authorities for being behind those leaflet scattering operations.
					
					 All facts clearly prove that the south Korean authorities are the prime movers of the anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will never allow the human scum to dare hurt even the dignity of its supreme leadership.
					
					 They remain unchanged in their will not to pardon this thrice-cursed crime. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop acting rashly, clearly aware of the gravity of the situation.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on U.S. Suicidal Policy
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on U.S. Suicidal Policy
						
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place in the U.S. recently with experts on the Korean issue attending on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the DPRK-U.S. agreed framework.
					 The participants asserted that what remains unchanged up to this date is the "U.S. ignorance of north Korea" and its groundless "theory of its collapse" and what has altered is the "bolstered nuclear capability of north Korea" and "smaller opportunity of U.S. option".
					
					 There were criticism and louder voices that "north Korea's abandonment of nuclear program is impossible" and "there is no way but dialogue." 
					
					 This indicates that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is censured even in the U.S. mainland as a failed policy.
					
					 The structure of confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. is turning unfavorable to the U.S. due to its policy for stifling the former.
					
					 The U.S. dream of occupying Korea through nuclear blackmail and political and economic pressure and, furthermore, using Korea as a bridgehead for carrying out its scenario for dominating the Asia-Pacific went up in smoke due to the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. arms buildup stepped up under the pretext of coping with the DPRK's nuclear force is making the U.S. financial condition more difficult.
					
					 The U.S. is crying in distress that the fate of its cities is put at peril due to the increasing number of nuclear weapons and missiles in the DPRK. It is also seized with fear that the unchallenged edge of its nuclear force may sink. Such uneasiness and fear were caused by itself.
					
					 20 years ago when it signed the DPRK-U.S. agreed framework for the settlement of the nuclear issue, the U.S. calculated that if it deterred the DPRK from developing atomic energy industry and employed delaying tactics, the DPRK would "collapse" soon.
					
					 Such wild dream remains unchanged even under the Obama administration as was the case with the Bush administration.
					
					 The U.S. policy-makers dreaming of only the DPRK's disarming and "collapse" will only face such consequences as uneasiness and fear caused by the DPRK's access to nukes and their qualitative and quantitative increase. 
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is like a foolish suicidal policy as it throws the whole of the U.S. into an abyss of ruin.
					
					 The voice of despair heard from among U.S. experts amounts to the recognition of this stark reality and an expression of rebuff to the responsible politicians.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK if it considers the DPRK's move to bolster up its nuclear capability as a threat to the U.S. strategic security.

articles.title: Leaflets Satirizing Chief Executive of S. Korea Scattered
articles.content:
Leaflets Satirizing Chief Executive of S. Korea Scattered
						
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Leaflets satirizing the puppet chief executive of south Korea were scattered above a building in Mapho District, Seoul on Oct. 31, drawing people's attention, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 It was reported that leaflets carrying a picture showing the ugly face of Park Geun Hye with words accusing the present regime totaled more than 4 000.
					
					 Similar leaflets were also scattered in the area of Kwanghwamun, Seoul in mid-October.
					
					 This is the manifestation of the resentment of the south Korean people towards the puppet group which has pursued unpopular policies including the evasion of the blame for the ferry Sewol disaster and retrogressive revision of the law on a pension for public servants after scuppering the hard-won opportunity of mending the north-south relations through their anti-north leaflet scattering operations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" on its website on Oct. 27.
					 The association carried the following introductory note:
					
					  Two decades have passed since the publication of the work "Socialism Is a Science" on Nov. 1, 1994, but the validity of Kim Jong Il's lucid analysis of the faith in socialism as a science which runs through the work and the frustration of socialism in some countries at that time and the invincibility of Korean-style socialism is clearly proved still now.
					
					 In the work he clarified that the collapse of socialism in various countries does not mean the failure of socialism as a science but the bankruptcy of opportunism which made socialism degenerated. He indicated that socialism is undergoing temporary painful ups and downs due to opportunism but it is sure to be revived and win the final victory for its scientific accuracy and truth.
					
					 His definition of socialism was like a beacon indicating the way for the global socialist movement to clear the dark clouds hung over it and many revolutionaries of the world accepted his work as their faith and rose up to revive socialism.
					
					 His work dealt a heavy ideological blow at the imperialists and the renegades of socialism who gave up the class struggle by yielding to imperialists.
					
					 The revolutionary people of the world boldly have turned out in the struggle against the exploitation by capital, firmly convinced of the victory of socialism, their ideal.
					
					 It is our hope that the revolutionaries and progressive people all over the world will regard his work as a must book.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Beninese, Nigerian Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Beninese, Nigerian Personages
						
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- There took place in different countries from Oct. 27 to 29 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Reading sessions on works of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, photo exhibition and film shows were held by the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies and the Nigerian Franoson Mannyon International Company Ltd.
					
					 Displayed at the photo exhibition were photos documenting revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also on display were photos showing the achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK in the building of a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and "Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification".
					
					 The chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism who doubles as rector of the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin read Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party". The chief said:
					
					 The image of Kim Jong Il is enshrined as the father of the nation and the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea in the hearts of the Korean people who believed in him as in Heaven and the world people recognize this fact.
					
					 He is always remembered by the Korean people and the world progressive people.
					
					 The acting chairman of the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies praised Kim Jong Il for providing a great programme for the national reunification and energetically leading the struggle to implement it, after reading his work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Syria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Syria
						
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- A Syrian committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated on Oct. 27.
					 The director of the Higher Education Department of the Regional Leadership of the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party was elected chairman of the memorial committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to Kim Jong Il's undying exploits and organize political and cultural events including remembrance meeting on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Denmark
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Denmark
						
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Copenhagen, Denmark on Oct. 27.
					 A member of the leadership of the Communist Party of Denmark and the chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association were elected co-chairmen of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia intencion de EE.UU. tendiente a derrocar RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia intencion de EE.UU. tendiente a derrocar RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 4 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que Estados Unidos cuestiona a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea so pretexto de problema de derechos humanos, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 4 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC:
					Recientemente, el secretario del Departamento de Estado de Estados Unidos, el enviado especial encargado de las conversaciones a 6 bandas de esta cartera, y otras autoridades norteamericanas soltaron disparates politicos encaminados a manchar en lo politico y moral la imagen de la RPDC y justificar sus maniobras de asilamiento y aplastamiento contra esta acusandola de "problema de DDHH".
					
					El imperio yanqui se vale de anacronico metodo de inventar el "problema de DDHH" de los paises que no le agradan, fomentar su inestabilidad interna, division y desintegracion y realizar el derrumbe de regimenes mediante la "revolucion de color" o la "transicion pacifica".
					
					Entre el debate verdadero sobre los derechos humanos y el "problema de DDHH" como aparato politico tendente a fomentar la "revolucion de color" y otros hay diferencia como la noche y el dia. 
					
					EE.UU. es el pais que no reconoce la misma soberania estatal que sintetiza DDHH del pueblo coreano.
					
					Es ilogico que este pais lo cuestione. 
					
					A diferencia de los ejecutivos anteriores, la actual administracion norteamericana, en particular, el actual secretario de Estado persiguen oficialmente la politica de derrocar nuestro Estado y regimen con el "problema de DDHH" y rompen asi el compromiso de la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre de 2005 en que la RPDC y EE.UU. acordaron "respetar la soberania de la contraparte y coexistir pacificamente", la cual devino la base fundamental de la Desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Puesto que EE.UU. abandona su compromiso, ya no valdra nada para nuestro pais la Desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana. Claro esta que uno no puede debatir el desarme unilateral de si mismo con el enemigo que se obstina en derrocar su regimen.
					
					Dejamos abiertas las puertas al verdadero dialogo sobre los DDHH con los paises que respetan nuestra soberania, pero no podemos permitir las platicas del mismo tema ni las conversaciones del problema nuclear con el enemigo que trata de derrocarnos.
					
					En un futuro no lejano, ya antes de que termine el mandato de la actual administracion, EE.UU. vera la victoria fulminante de nuestra linea de impulsar paralelamente la construccion economica y el aumento de fuerzas nucleares.

articles.title: Base de investigacion para desarrollo y uso de energia natural
articles.content:
Base de investigacion para desarrollo y uso de energia natural
Pyongyang, 4 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Bajo la direccion minuciosa del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, fue fundada en la Academia Estatal de Ciencias de Corea la nueva base de investigacion para el desarrollo y uso de energias naturales.
					En el Instituto de Energias Naturales hay las salas de investigacion general sobre las energias de diferentes tipos como la eolica, la geotermica y la solar, la biblioteca electronica, la sala de seminario cientifico-tecnico, la exposicion de exitos cientificos, etc.
					
					Se puede introducir en la produccion los exitos de investigacion porque se acondicionaron los campos de experimento y las fabricas pilotos.
					
					Estan distribuidas tambien las instalaciones de servicios publicos para los cientificos.
					
					El Mariscal propuso instaurar el instituto con vistas a prevenir la contaminacion medioambiental y resolvio todos los problemas surgidos.
					
					Hace poco, recorrio el instituto cerciorandose de los exitos logrados por los cientificos.
					
					El director del instituto, Ri Myong Son, dijo a la ACNC que los cientificos estan trabajando intensamente ahora con la voluntad de recompensar grandes benevolencias del Mariscal, que les entrego gratis nuevas viviendas modernas, al superar el nivel sofisticado de las ciencias.

articles.title: RPDC impulsa divulgacion de informatica deportiva
articles.content:
RPDC impulsa divulgacion de informatica deportiva
Pyongyang, 4 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se despliega activamente a traves de la biblioteca de ciencia de deporte la divulgacion de informatica deportiva.
					Bajo la relacion estrecha de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, los conjuntos deportivos y otras unidades correspondientes, la biblioteca presta atencion primordial a recoger los datos de informatica deportiva de punta necesarios al desarrollo de tecnica deportiva.
					
					Los datos recogidos se divulgan a traves de la red de computadores al sector de deporte y las  unidades que tienen interes a esta rama.
					
					Mejora de continuo el servicio de informatica para que los conjuntos deportivos y los organos relacionados con esta rama de todo el pais reciben a tiempo los ultimos datos de informatica deportiva y logren innovaciones en el desarrollo de ciencia y tecnica de deporte.
					
					Los exitos cientifico-tecnicos presentados en la exposicion nacional de exitos cientifico-tecnicos de deporte dan ayuda a los ejercicios de los conjuntos deportivos y las escuelas deportivas de jovenes y ninos escolares.
					
					Por otra parte, numerosos deportistas y aficionados visitan la biblioteca para estudiar los conocimientos y los datos tecnicos de deporte.
					
					En la biblioteca se impulsa la labor para establecer una nueva red de servicio de informatica por desarrollar el deporte masivo.
					
					Tambien se promueve la labor por transmitir al extranjero el aspecto de desarrollo de deporte de Corea.
